name: updateUserProfile
description:
Update a [Zoom Phone](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/categories/360001370051-Zoom-Phone) user's profile. **Scopes:** `phone:write` `phone:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`
**Prerequisite:** 1. Business or Enterprise account 2. A Zoom Phone license

extension_number.description: The extension number of the user. The number must be complete (i.e. site number + short extension).

site_id.description: Unique identifier of the [site](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360020809672) where the user should be moved or assigned.
